episodes.title: Multiply Thy Pain
episodes.desc: After multiple failed attempts of IVF, actress Anna Victoria Alcott wants nothing more than to start a family; as the buzz around her recent film grows, she fears that something may be targeting her and her pursuit of motherhood.

episodes.title: Rockabye
episodes.desc: AIt's awards season and Anna is primed to be a major player who will be in contention; after a frightening encounter convinces her that she's being followed, she begins to question who she can trust.

episodes.title: When the Bough Breaks
episodes.desc: As Anna and Dex settle into their Hamptons sanctuary, the comfort begins to fade; her circle of trust is slowly shrinking and doubt creeps into Anna's head; the evil could be right under her nose.

episodes.title: Vanishing Twin
episodes.desc: With help from Siobhan, a major announcement helps restore Anna's public image; behind closed doors, however, something powerful seems to be taking over.

episodes.title: Preech
episodes.desc: Anna senses the dark presence closing in on her, closer than ever; Ms. Preecher reveals pieces of her past and may know the truth about what's happening to Anna and Dex.

episodes.title: Opening Night
episodes.desc: A glimpse into Anna's past reveals why she craves motherhood, while Dex's troubling family life is dragged into the spotlight.

episodes.title: Ave Hestia
episodes.desc: Entrenched in her grapple for fame and motherhood, Anna may be involved in a cycle much bigger, and older, than she realizes.

episodes.title: Little Gold Man
episodes.desc: The world around Anna is starting to crescendo in every way: her career path continues to skyrocket, while her personal life is more stressful than ever, just in time for Hollywood's big night.

episodes.title: The Auteur
episodes.desc: Her choices have unknowingly led to deadly consequences, but Anna can still have it all, for a price.

episodes.title: Something's Coming
episodes.desc: Mysterious deaths and disappearances ramp up in the city. A doctor makes a frightening discovery, and a local reporter becomes tomorrow's headline.

episodes.title: Thank You for Your Service
episodes.desc: Gino grapples with his trauma. Patrick's search takes him to dark places. A stranger contacts Hannah with a grave warning.

episodes.title: Smoke Signals
episodes.desc: Without the NYPD's help, Gino is forced to get resourceful. A traumatizing event brings dangerous suspects closer than ever.

episodes.title: Black Out
episodes.desc: As darkness consumes the city, evil takes root in the unlikeliest of places...

episodes.title: Bad Fortune
episodes.desc: Hannah receives concerning news while Patrick suffers a loss; the city's most dangerous resident reveals his true motives.

episodes.title: The Body
episodes.desc: A chilling event from Patrick’s past returns to haunt him. Gino and Henry are determined to uncover it at any cost.

episodes.title: The Sentinel
episodes.desc: Patrick's search reaches an epic conclusion; the group shifts its focus, but a different plan is in store for Hannah.

episodes.title: Fire Island
episodes.desc: Terrifying events at Fire Island rupture the group and force them to reconsider everything.

episodes.title: Requiem 1981/1987 Part One
episodes.desc: As vitality expires, two old friends are led through unique journeys of retrospection.

episodes.title: Requiem 1981/1987 Part Two
episodes.desc: Grief and peril dominate Gino; the discovery of a tragedy becomes a revelation for Adam.

episodes.title: Cape Fear
episodes.desc: A struggling writer, his pregnant wife, and their daughter move to an isolated beach town for the winter. Once they're settled in, the town’s true residents begin to make themselves known.

episodes.title: Pale
episodes.desc: A quick fix for Harry’s writer’s block has unexpected side effects. Two eccentric locals offer Harry a helping hand.

episodes.title: Thirst
episodes.desc: A quick fix for Harry’s writer’s block has unexpected side effects. Two eccentric locals offer Harry a helping hand.

episodes.title: Blood Buffet
episodes.desc: The dark history of Provincetown and its residents are brought to light.

episodes.title: Gaslight
episodes.desc: Harry struggles to keep Alma under control. Doris is pushed past her limits.

episodes.title: Winter Kills
episodes.desc: Ursula devises a sinister plan. The Gardners write their final act.

episodes.title: Take Me to Your Leader
episodes.desc: A group of college students on a camping trip are swept up in a horrifying and deadly conspiracy decades in the making.

episodes.title: Inside
episodes.desc: The President struggles with the morality of a deal he must make.

episodes.title: Blue Moon
episodes.desc: An unexpected visitor arrives at the White House and reveals the details of the horrific plan.

episodes.title: The Future Perfect
episodes.desc: Mamie takes matters into her own hands. The fate of the future is revealed.
